summary: With this mod, for any level of difficulty, you will be equal to NPCs. So you deal the same amount of damage.
descriptionHtml:
Hello !
I always thought that Bethesda's level of difficulty were quite bad. Where is the fun if you can deal 3x more damage than the NPC do ? Or if the NPC is 4x stronger than you ?
So with this mod, you and your ennemies are equal. If you deal 100% damages (novice), npc deals 100% damages. Same thing for any level of difficulty :
Apprentice is 200%/200%
Adept is 300%/300%
...
Legendary is 600%/600%


This mod does NOT change any NPC AI, so i recommend you use others mod to make NPC more clever and reactive.

Don't forget to endorse if you enjoyed this file. Available for Fallout 3 and New Vegas.
author: Kastanye
